intro: You're stopped by a rich looking boy.
speaker: Rich Boy
intro_dialogue:
Good day to you.
    $I can't help but notice that your
{{strongestPokemon}} looks positively divine!
    $I've always wanted to have a pet like that!
    $I'd pay you handsomely,
and also give you this old bauble!
title: An Offer You Can't Refuse
description:
You're being offered a @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{Shiny Charm} and {{price, money}} for your {{strongestPokemon}}!

It's an extremely good deal, but can you really bear to part with such a strong team member?

Wonderful!@d{32} Come along, {{strongestPokemon}}!
        $It's time to show you off to everyone at the yacht club!
        $They'll be so jealous!
